titleInfo.title: Ernest Tubb and his Texas Troubadours - It Just Don't Matter Now (Grand Ole Opry performance)

mods.abstract: Excerpt from a WSM (Nashville, TN) broadcast of the Grand Ole Opry (possibly the Royal Crown Cola segment, unconfirmed). Featuring host Louie Buck, and a performance by Ernest Tubb and his Texas Troubadours. Louie and Ernest talk about Carrie Rodgers, who is in attendance. It is evident that Ernie Keller is the announcer.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
